wikitext.*:
'''''vakko''''' is a [[Qenya]] noun meaning "jacket, coat".<ref name=GL>{{PE|11}}, p. 21</ref>

[[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that the form ''vacco'' (retaining the same meaning) could be valid [[Neo-Quenya]].<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]], "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 25 June 2011)</ref>

==Cognates==
*[[Gnomish|Goldogrin]] ''Bacha'' ("jacket, coat")<ref name=GL/>
